backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with user profiles, workouts, recovery state types, exercise data, and test recovery mode flag.
backend/migration.mo: Implements state migration by mapping old actor fields to the new actor structure without altering data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing workout preview ordering requirements with associated files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of all frontend files, describing their purpose and key behaviors.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY.md: Tracks deployment retry attempts and notes a recent backend muscle-group matching fix.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document configuring PWA metadata, icons, splash screens, and loading the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, icons, and categories.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication flow, routing, workout generation validation, and page rendering.
Modal for updating the user's bodyweight with validation and profile update mutation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with tabs and a settings modal trigger, including vibration feedback.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseChangeMo: Modal to view and select alternative exercises, recording selections and updating the parent component.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header showing branding, test mode badge, settings button, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProfileLoadingSc: Empty file placeholder for a profile loading screen component.
frontend/src/components/PullToRefresh.ts: Custom pull-to-refresh wrapper implementing touch handling, resistance, and refresh animations.
Component displaying muscle recovery status with loading states, badges, and optional weighted leg recovery.
frontend/src/components/SettingsModal.ts: A modal for editing and saving user profile settings such as weight, dark mode, rest times, and training frequency using React state and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Displays an animated fullâ€‘screen splash screen with a dumbbell icon and app title.
frontend/src/components/StatusBar.tsx: Shows a top status bar with current streak and today's date using simple UI layout.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutShareModa: A modal for sharing a workout via link, QR code, or native share API with copy and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Empty placeholder file for a backend actor hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context for managing Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend user profiles and workouts, including validation and detailed error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Implements a robust hook for acquiring and maintaining screen wake lock with re-acquisition and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, dark theme CSS variables, mobile typography, safe-area utilities, and system font settings.
frontend/src/lib/profileCache.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Provides utilities to save, load, clear, and check active workout sessions using sessionStorage with 24-hour expiry.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Converts backend BigInt timestamps from nanoseconds to milliseconds and offers validation and formatting helpers.
Groups exercises by muscle group, enforcing a fixed order and leg subsections to build structured workout sections.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it in query and identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard with workout history, recovery data, timestamp formatting, and pull-to-refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays workout history with date formatting, volume conversion, refresh logic, and a calendar view of training days.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login screen using Internet Identity with branding, feature highlights, and a login button.
frontend/src/pages/NewWorkoutPage.tsx: Provides UI to select a workout type and generate a new workout using various generation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Collects user profile data such as gender, weight, and training preferences and saves it via a mutation.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays muscle recovery status and weekly training volume with refresh support using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/SharedWorkoutPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for shared workout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutPreviewPage.ts: Validates and previews a generated workout, allowing exercise changes and regeneration before starting a session.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutSessionPage.ts: Manages an active workout session with set tracking, timers, exercise changes, persistence, and PR detection.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for exercises, workouts, recovery state, and related data structures used solely on the frontend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for reading, writing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, plugins, colors, typography, keyframes, and responsive container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, fixes needed, architectural notes, and known issues related to workout generation and frontend rendering.
